definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="lootroll">lootroll</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="-45" y="-90"><field name="trigger">block_break</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Brush</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">OR</field><value name="A"><block type="compare_mcblocks"><value name="a"><block type="blockstate_from_deps"></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.SAND#0</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="compare_mcblocks"><value name="a"><block type="blockstate_from_deps"></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.GRAVEL</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="cancel_event"><next><block type="block_remove_with_particles"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">loot spawn ~ ~ ~ loot the_wet_smp_rehydrated:blocks/brush_break_gravel</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
